bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality
bibl.note: Workshop held at the Rovira i Virgili University in Tarragona in october 2010. - Pp. 9-12: E.S., Presentation. - 12 contributions.
bibl.seg: Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz & Rosa Cuesta (edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22.
Tarragona, Institut Català d'Arqueologia Clàssica, 2011, 4°, 222 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-84-939033-5-0.
Workshop held at the Rovira i Virgili University in Tarragona in october 2010. - Pp. 9-12: E.S., Presentation. - 12 contributions.
